monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster gets a Charge stack, share it with another Monster in your party.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Arcane Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery (Buff)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (120 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Armor Up
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 75% Defense) Applies Barrier & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Bounty
skills.description: This Monster gets 2 random Buffs when an enemy Monster is knocked out.

skills.name: Buff Charging
skills.description: When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Chain Lightning
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Shock on an enemy, 40% chance to spread it to another enemy.

skills.name: Charge Amplifier
skills.description: Aura: All Charge stacks in the party are 33% stronger.

skills.name: Charge Beam
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (wind) applies Sorcery (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Charge Beam Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (wind) applies Sorcery (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Charge Beam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (wind) applies Sorcery (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Charging Shield
skills.description: Shield self for 60 when receiving a Charge stack.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Critical Sorcery
skills.description: Unique Aura: Sorcery also increases the critical chance by 6%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Electrocute
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Shock (Debuff).

skills.name: Electrolytes
skills.description: Unique Aura: Monsters in the party have a 75% chance to remove a Debuff from themselves when they trigger Shock damage.

skills.name: Enchantment
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Enchantment Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Enchantment Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Sorcery (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Energize
skills.description: Unique Aura: Monsters in the party recover 7.5% of Max Health when they trigger Shock damage.

skills.name: Enlighten
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Enlighten Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Enlighten Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sorcery & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Full Potential
skills.description: Shield target for 25% of target's Max Health Applies Might, Sorcery, Regeneration, Sidekick, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Glare
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, apply a stack of Blind on the attacker.

skills.name: Gold Sense
skills.description: Increases Gold gained after combat by 10%. (If this Monster is participating in combat)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gets a Charge stack, share it with another Monster in your party.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 80% (240%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Magic Attack
skills.description: This Monster's basic attack is replaced by Magic Attack: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage, gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Conflux
skills.description: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Symbiosis
skills.description: Regenerate 5 Mana for each heal received.  (Triggers on any Healing effect)

skills.name: Multi Sorcery
skills.description: Aura: Sorcery (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description: Every time this Monster takes a hit, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Shared Sorcery
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Sorcery (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Sorcery.

skills.name: Sheltered
skills.description: While under the effect of a Shield, reduce all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (125 + 40% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (200 + 45% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (350 + 50% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (250 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (250 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Shocking Current
skills.description: Every Wind attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Sorcery
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Voltage
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Wind Affinity
skills.description: Wind attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Skill Potion
drops.description: Grants a skill point. Can only be consumed once per Monster
